root.name: Emergency 4: Global Fighters for Life
root.description: Emergency 4: Global Fighter for Life is a real-time strategy game that has the player have control of an emergency team including EMS, law enforcement, fire department, search and rescue, and technical units. It is known as 911: First Responders in North America.The game contains 20 missions and a Endless and challenge free play mode. Challenge mode gives the player tasks that begin easy to hard. Endless mode has the player just respond to events no matter the difficulty.

similar_games.game: Emergency 2: The Ultimate Fight for Life (Deluxe Edition)
